messages.title: YOUR GREEN PARTY CANDIDATE
messages.content: Hannah Patton - fighting for the common good in Maidstone on the Weald

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Focusing education on skills for the future can make a difference. Need to ensure education must not only deliver grades but build confidence, well-being and self-esteem.
Policies should work for everyone, not just the privileged few. They should protect public services and manage resources sustainably.
Climate change is turning into disaster and all fossil fuels must stay in the ground. Ecological transport policy and focus on renewable sources is needed.

mentions.candidate: Hannah Patton Green Party Parliamentary Candidate

issues.economy: Policies should work for everyone, not just the privileged few. They should protect public services and manage resources sustainably.
issues.education: Focusing education on skills for the future can make a difference.
issues.environment: Climate change is turning into disaster and all fossil fuels must stay in the ground.

leaflet.personalStatement: Hannah Patton works locally as a youth worker and is a former member of the UK Youth Parliament.

politicalExperience.role: Former member of the UK Youth Parliament

quotes.text: Young people have a lot to offer to the further development of our political conversation and discussions, I would like young people to have the same opportunities to engage with politics that I have had.

leaflet.additionalNotes: This publication has been supported and funded by ordinary people and printed on 100% post-consumer fibre, FSCÂ® recycled certified paper. Process colours are vegetable oil based. Prints by RAP Spiderweb Ltd, Oldham - powered by solar energy.
